errors.test: not(cda:participant[@typeCode='HLD'][cda:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.90']]/cda:participantRole/cda:addr) or cda:participant[@typeCode='HLD'][cda:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.90']]/cda:participantRole/cda:addr[cda:streetAddressLine and cda:city and ((not(cda:country) or cda:country!='US') or (cda:country='US' and cda:state and cda:postalCode))]
errors.description: The content of addr *SHALL* be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:1198-10483).
